text_block_list.text: Several days after the Selection Race. I spotted Copano Rickey on the training grounds.

text_block_list.name: Copano Rickey
text_block_list.text: Haa, haa, huu, huu…… Wood, Fire, Soil, Gold, Be Blessed with Luck! Fire, Soil, Gold, Water, Be Blessed with Luck!

text_block_list.name: Copano Rickey
text_block_list.text: Huu…… Haahuuuu…… That should do it. Next, the wood chip course……!

text_block_list.name: Copano Rickey
text_block_list.text: Ah, Trainer! Yeah, after such a disappointing result, I figured I needed to step up the training another level.
choice_data_list: Because of what Hokko Tarumae said?

text_block_list.name: Copano Rickey
text_block_list.text: Eh!? No, no. I'm not doing this particularly because Tarumae told me to 『Do more training』.

text_block_list.name: Copano Rickey
text_block_list.text: I do about this much everyday already☆ Feng Shui isn't something that can fulfill your wishes. It's something that can show you where to focus your effort!
―Where to focus your efforts. Judging by those words, it seems that Copano Rickey isn't an Uma Musume that solely relies on Feng Shui.

text_block_list.name: Copano Rickey
text_block_list.text: It's not that there's been a change in how hard I'm going to work but, that huge loss from before……I felt I needed to do something about that!

text_block_list.name: Copano Rickey
text_block_list.text: I never thought that I wouldn't be able to hear the Voice of the Earth. Like this, there's no way I'll be able to help anyone out.
"To help anyone out". That's the first time I've heard her say those words. It seems like Copano Rickey had some kind of hidden reason to keep running.
choice_data_list: Can we talk for a bit?
Can we talk for a bit?

text_block_list.name: Copano Rickey
text_block_list.text: Yeah! Of course, as much as you want♪ I was just about to take a break anyways.
And so we took a walk, heading to the park near Tracen Academy―

text_block_list.name: Chinese Restaurant Shopkeeper
text_block_list.text: Oh, Rickey-chan! If it ain't Rickey-chan! Thanks for before!

text_block_list.name: Copano Rickey
text_block_list.text: Ah, it's the old man from that Chinese restaurant! So, how'd it go after that?

text_block_list.name: Chinese Restaurant Shopkeeper
text_block_list.text: Yeah, it was a huge success! Just like Rickey-chan said, after changing the location of the tree in the garden, and making the ramen bowls orange……

text_block_list.name: Chinese Restaurant Shopkeeper
text_block_list.text: It feels like the atmosphere has changed, and the number of customers increased. And because of that, my bed ridden old man finally understands.

text_block_list.name: Chinese Restaurant Shopkeeper
text_block_list.text: I understand not wanting to change the way the place looked but…… sometimes it's important to have the courage to change, too.

text_block_list.name: Chinese Restaurant Shopkeeper
text_block_list.text: With this, it looks like I'll be able to keep the old man's store going. Even the customers that have been coming since I was a kid were overjoyed.

text_block_list.name: Copano Rickey
text_block_list.text: Waah, that's good! That's right, if the shop closed up, everyone would be unhappy too.

text_block_list.name: Copano Rickey
text_block_list.text: Rather than sitting and waiting, it's better to continue on! If I was able to give you the push you needed, even if it was only a little, then I'm glad!

text_block_list.name: Chinese Restaurant Shopkeeper
text_block_list.text: Yeah, for the sake of my old man and our regulars, I'll be counting on you for more Feng Shui advice!
After bowing his head repeatedly, the Restaurant Employee took his leave.

text_block_list.name: Copano Rickey
text_block_list.text: ―And just like that, Feng Shui can help people that are a little lost or find themselves at a standstill.

text_block_list.name: Copano Rickey
text_block_list.text: It was the same for me, and I've seen it for many other Uma Musume as well. It happens a lot, with just a little push from Feng Shui, things will work out.

text_block_list.name: Copano Rickey
text_block_list.text: That's why I want more people to learn about Feng Shui! And I want everyone to be happy! To learn Feng Shui, avoid misfortune, and invite fortune!

text_block_list.name: Copano Rickey
text_block_list.text: Therefore, I need to win in races so everyone can learn just how great it is♪
choice_data_list: Then you're doing this for everyone……

text_block_list.name: Copano Rickey
text_block_list.text: Saying it's for everyone might be a bit of an exaggeration, but wouldn't you want anyone to be able to be happy?

text_block_list.name: Copano Rickey
text_block_list.text: But, well, if I'm the one losing, then it's not very convincing. I never thought that, during an important race, I'd be unable to hear the Voice of the Earth.
Copano Rickey genuinely wanted to be able to help anyone. Along with being impressed with her, something weighed on my mind.
choice_data_list: What is that "Voice of the Earth"?

text_block_list.name: Copano Rickey
text_block_list.text: Voice of the Earth? Ah, even though I call it a voice, it's not like I really hear a voice, it's more like I just get a feeling.

text_block_list.name: Copano Rickey
text_block_list.text: Ever since elementary school, I've been able to hear the "Voice of the Earth". Like during athletics competitions, if I focus during the race―

text_block_list.name: Copano Rickey
text_block_list.text: 『Run like this』, as if it was from the viewpoint of the Earth. The flow of qi, how to move around the next corner, I could understand it all in detail. That's why……!

text_block_list.name: Copano Rickey
text_block_list.text: I was able to win consecutively. By training my body while in harmony with nature, becoming one with all of creation, by continuing on the correct path, I could reach the goal first!

text_block_list.name: Copano Rickey
text_block_list.text: But, with that previous Selection Race, it was difficult to hear that voice. Was it because of nerves, or lack of preparation? Hmmmmm……

text_block_list.name: Copano Rickey
text_block_list.text: Being in harmony with nature is part of Feng Shui, but I felt a kind of distance, and I guess it felt like I couldn't become one with it……
Copano Rickey was earnest but troubled. If the problem was being "Unable to feel nature" then I wanted to help her resolve it.
choice_data_list: Want to try going somewhere tomorrow?

text_block_list.name: Copano Rickey
text_block_list.text: Eh, going somewhere……Trainer, where to?

text_block_list.name: Copano Rickey
text_block_list.text: Waaah, a picnic～♪ As a change of pace, this might be best! How about I try yelling out to those mountains～?

text_block_list.name: Copano Rickey
text_block_list.text: Rickey☆ Lucky☆ So Happy～～～～!!!
I brought Copano Rickey to the mountains. To figure out why she couldn't hear the Voice of the Earth, this was probably the ideal environment.

text_block_list.name: Copano Rickey
text_block_list.text: Yeah! In a place like this, it's easy to see the "Ley Lines". And you could say the flow of qi is easily discernible!

text_block_list.name: Copano Rickey
text_block_list.text: Yeah, Ley Lines! They often follow along ridges, and you can kind of feel the flow of qi through them. Those are ley lines. And then……!

text_block_list.name: Copano Rickey
text_block_list.text: And the exits of those Ley Lines are called "Power Spots". Where the mountain's ki flows down to the beach and gathers, it becomes a power spot.

text_block_list.name: Copano Rickey
text_block_list.text: And if I focus here like this―

text_block_list.name: Copano Rickey
text_block_list.text: Today I can feel it properly. The ki from this "Power Spot". That swirling power, I can feel it all around me.

text_block_list.name: Copano Rickey
text_block_list.text: Even when I close my eyes― I can see the entire beach. I can hear the Voice of the Earth, and very clearly.

text_block_list.name: Copano Rickey
text_block_list.text: Hmmm, I'm in perfect condition. So it's not that something was wrong with my senses. But then why was I unable to hear it during that Selection Race……?
I thought about it. If it's not her condition then…… the reason she could hear it on this "Beach" now, but not on the "Race Course".
Copano Rickey said that she would win consecutively at athletics events when she was young. Even on "School Grounds" she could hear that voice……
On the "School Grounds" and "Beach" she could hear it, but on the "Race Course" she couldn't. Perhaps, that's it―
Clearly, in regards to Feng Shui, if there was a difference in those environments, then―

text_block_list.name: Copano Rickey
text_block_list.text: Trainer……? Is something wrong?

text_block_list.name: Copano Rickey
text_block_list.text: Might know what?

text_block_list.name: Copano Rickey
text_block_list.text: Eeeeeeeh, really?
And if my prediction is correct, then Copano Rickey―
Will definitely be able to display her full power in the next Selection Race.
